snippet: GLAUBERMAN--Alex (Jack). Congregation Shaaray Tefila records with deep sorrow the death of our longtime cherished member. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his wife, Estelle and his family. May God comfort his loved ones and may Jack's memory be for blessing. Rabbi Deborah A. Hirsch Michael Starr, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: GLAUBERMAN--Alex (Jack). Congregation Shaaray Tefila records with deep sorrow the death of our longtime cherished member. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his wife, Estelle and his family. May God comfort his loved ones and may Jack's memory be for blessing. Rabbi Deborah A. Hirsch Michael Starr, President 1/3
